content: this easy bucket hat crochet pattern is inspired by the classic breton striped shirts of the french navy it is available in 6 sizes the adult medium size pattern was originally published in three parts as the sixteenth weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting flat in row crocheting in the back loop starting with a magic magic_ring includes links to video tutorials in pattern crocheting in the front loop and third loop changing colors crocheting over yarn tails seaming with slip_stitch and single_crochet joins includes video tutorials in pattern special stitch pattern h-half_double_crochet includes written instructions and video in pattern **skill level** easy **finished sizes** preemie newborn infant child adult medium adult large *first photographed sample is size adult medium shown on a
